      • setKeyColumns

        public Join.Builder setKeyColumns(java.lang.String... keyColumnNames)
        Specify the columns to use as the key. (With multiple columns: compound key) Here, we are assuming that both data sources have the same key column names. If this is not the case, use setKeyColumnsLeft(String...) and setKeyColumnsRight(String...).
        Parameters:
        keyColumnNames - Name of the columns to use as the key to join on
